actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the upcoming meeting in Geneva of the Secretary of State with the Soviet Foreign Minister, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States that the Senate: (1) commends the President's commitment to make nuclear arms control and reduction talks with the Soviet Union a priority goal; (2) offers support and urges the President to approach such talks with flexibility; and (3) recommends that the President include as U.S. observers at any negotiations with the Soviets a bipartisan group of Senators.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the upcoming meeting in Geneva of the Secretary of State with the Soviet Foreign Minister, and for other purposes.
